EmailTemplate.description: Email template for PG notification email when an Account Submisison case is created or modified (when Performance Guarantees = Yes)
EmailTemplate.name: GEMS PG Notification Template for Account Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Account} - {!NullValue(Case.Account_Number__c, "")} - {!NullValue(Case.GEMS_Effective_Date__c, "")} - Performance Guarantees
